numbered_ace_sentences: 4. Legacy applicants have a higher admission advantage than non-legacy applicants.
5. Poor legacy applicants have an admission advantage.
6. Wealthy legacy applicants have the highest admission advantage.
7. I wonder why legacy applicants have a higher admission advantage than non-legacy applicants.
8. I wonder which schools the legacy applicants chose.
9. I wonder whether the legacy applicants chose only Ivy League schools.
10. I wonder whether the legacy applicants also chose state schools.
12. Some students in my community work hard to apply to these schools.
13. Some wealthy legacy applicants apply to these schools.
14. Some hard-working students get pushed aside for wealthy legacy applicants.
15. The headline is: Money is a necessity.
16. The headline is: Legacy is a perk when applying to colleges.
